statements.select: SELECT DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_ID , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_CODE , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_NAME , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_REMARK , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_STRING1 , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_STRING2 , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_STRING3 , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_STRING4 , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_STRING5 , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_SEQNO , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_ISVALID , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_CREATED , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_CREATE , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_UPDATED , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_UPDATE FROM DATA_DICTIONARY

SELECT DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_ID , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_CODE , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_NAME , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_REMARK , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_STRING1 , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_STRING2 , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_STRING3 , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_STRING4 , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_STRING5 , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_SEQNO , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_ISVALID , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_CREATED , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_CREATE , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_UPDATED , DATA_DICTIONARY.DICTIONARY_UPDATE FROM DATA_DICTIONARY
DICTIONARY_ID=#DICTIONARY_ID,dbType=Int32#
statements.insert:
SELECT last_insert_rowid() AS DICTIONARY_ID
INSERT INTO DATA_DICTIONARY ( DICTIONARY_CODE , DICTIONARY_NAME , DICTIONARY_REMARK , DICTIONARY_STRING1 , DICTIONARY_STRING2 , DICTIONARY_STRING3 , DICTIONARY_STRING4 , DICTIONARY_STRING5 , DICTIONARY_SEQNO , DICTIONARY_ISVALID , DICTIONARY_CREATED , DICTIONARY_CREATE , DICTIONARY_UPDATED , DICTIONARY_UPDATE ) VALUES ( #DICTIONARY_CODE,dbType=String# , #DICTIONARY_NAME,dbType=String# , #DICTIONARY_REMARK,dbType=String# , #DICTIONARY_STRING1,dbType=String# , #DICTIONARY_STRING2,dbType=String# , #DICTIONARY_STRING3,dbType=String# , #DICTIONARY_STRING4,dbType=String# , #DICTIONARY_STRING5,dbType=String# , #DICTIONARY_SEQNO,dbType=String# , #DICTIONARY_ISVALID,dbType=String# , DateTime() , #DICTIONARY_CREATE,dbType=String# , DateTime() , #DICTIONARY_UPDATE,dbType=String# )
statements.update: UPDATE DATA_DICTIONARY SET DICTIONARY_CODE = #DICTIONARY_CODE,dbType=String# , DICTIONARY_NAME = #DICTIONARY_NAME,dbType=String# , DICTIONARY_REMARK = #DICTIONARY_REMARK,dbType=String# , DICTIONARY_STRING1 = #DICTIONARY_STRING1,dbType=String# , DICTIONARY_STRING2 = #DICTIONARY_STRING2,dbType=String# , DICTIONARY_STRING3 = #DICTIONARY_STRING3,dbType=String# , DICTIONARY_STRING4 = #DICTIONARY_STRING4,dbType=String# , DICTIONARY_STRING5 = #DICTIONARY_STRING5,dbType=String# , DICTIONARY_SEQNO = #DICTIONARY_SEQNO,dbType=String# , DICTIONARY_ISVALID = #DICTIONARY_ISVALID,dbType=String# , DICTIONARY_UPDATED = DateTime() , DICTIONARY_UPDATE = #DICTIONARY_UPDATE,dbType=String# WHERE (DICTIONARY_ID = #DICTIONARY_ID,dbType=String#)
